00009   #define inline            __inline

00012 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------
00013  *  MISRAC Rule 8.5 Deviation: This header file contains definitions
00014  *  for the following inline funtions.  These functions are shared
00015  *  among more than one VXLIB kernel, so it is better to have them
00016  *  in a common header file than to replicate the code.
00017  * ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00018 static inline int32_t VXLIB_sizeof(uint32_t type);
00019 
00021 typedef enum _VXLIB_data_type_e
00022 {
00023     /* Standard fixed point data types */
00024     VXLIB_INT8  = 0,
00025     VXLIB_INT16 = 1,
00026     VXLIB_INT32 = 2,
00027     VXLIB_INT64 = 3,
00028 
00029     VXLIB_UINT8  = 4,
00030     VXLIB_UINT16 = 5,
00031     VXLIB_UINT24 = 6,
00032     VXLIB_UINT32 = 7,
00033     VXLIB_UINT64 = 8,
00034 
00035     /* Standard floating point data types */
00036     VXLIB_FLOAT16 = 9,
00037     VXLIB_FLOAT32 = 10,
00038     VXLIB_FLOAT64 = 11
00039 
00040 } VXLIB_data_type_e;
00041

00115 static inline int32_t VXLIB_sizeof(uint32_t type)
00116 {
00117 
00118     int32_t size = 1;
00119 
00120     if((type == VXLIB_INT8)  ||
00121        (type == VXLIB_UINT8))
00122     {
00123         size = 1;
00124     }
00125     else if((type == VXLIB_INT16)  ||
00126             (type == VXLIB_UINT16) ||
00127             (type == VXLIB_FLOAT16))
00128     {
00129         size = 2;
00130     }
00131     else if(type == VXLIB_UINT24)
00132     {
00133         size = 3;
00134     }
00135     else if((type == VXLIB_INT32)  ||
00136             (type == VXLIB_UINT32) ||
00137             (type == VXLIB_FLOAT32))
00138     {
00139         size = 4;
00140     }
00141     else if((type == VXLIB_INT64)  ||
00142             (type == VXLIB_UINT64) ||
00143             (type == VXLIB_FLOAT64))
00144     {
00145         size = 8;
00146     }
00147     else {
00148         size = 1;
00149     }
00150 
00151     return size;
00152 }
